titles.title: A resolution tendering the thanks of the Senate to the Senate staff for the courteous, dignified, and impartial manner in which they have assisted the deliberations of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/22/1988--Introduced. Thanks the following Senate staff for the courteous, dignified, and impartial manner in which they assisted Senate deliberations during the session of the 100th Congress: the Secretary of the Senate, the Sergeant at Arms of the Senate, the Secretary for the Majority, the Secretary for the Minority, and the floor staff of the two parties.
